option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# AI Astrology Application - Complete Setup Guide
## Overview This is a full-stack AI Astrology application built with: - **Backend**: Spring Boot 3.2 with Java 17 - **Frontend**: React 18 with modern UI components - **AI Model**: HuggingFace AstroSage-8B model via REST API - **Database**: H2 (in-memory, can be swapped for PostgreSQL)
## Prerequisites 1. **Java 17+** - Required for backend - Download from: https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/downloads/
2. **Node.js 16+** - Required for frontend - Download from: https://nodejs.org/
3. **Maven 3.8+** - For building the backend - Download from: https://maven.apache.org/
4. **HuggingFace API Key** (Optional but recommended) - Get free API key: https://huggingface.co/settings/tokens - The app will use mock responses if API key is not configured
## Project Structure ``` AiAstro/ ├── backend/ # Spring Boot application │ ├── src/main/java/ │ │ └── com/aiastro/ │ │ ├── controller/ # REST API endpoints │ │ ├── service/ # Business logic │ │ ├── model/ # Database entities │ │ ├── repository/ # Data access │ │ └── dto/ # Request/Response objects │ ├── src/main/resources/ │ │ └── application.properties # Configuration │ └── pom.xml # Maven dependencies │ └── frontend/ # React application ├── public/ # Static files ├── src/ │ ├── components/ # React components │ ├── App.js # Main app component │ └── index.js # Entry point ├── package.json # NPM dependencies └── .env # Environment variables ```
## Quickstart - Windows (PowerShell)
### 1. Start the Backend
```powershell # Navigate to backend directory cd C:\Users\hp\Videos\SpringBoot\AiAstro\backend
# Build the application mvn clean package -DskipTests
# Run the application java -jar target\astrology-backend-1.0.0.jar --server.port=8080 ```
The backend will start on `http://localhost:8080`
### 2. Start the Frontend (New Terminal)
```powershell # Navigate to frontend directory cd C:\Users\hp\Videos\SpringBoot\AiAstro\frontend
# Install dependencies npm install
# Start the development server npm start ```
The frontend will open automatically at `http://localhost:3000`
## Configuration
### Backend Configuration (application.properties)
```properties # Server Configuration server.port=8080
# Database (H2 in-memory) spring.datasource.url=jdbc:h2:mem:aiastro spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto=create-drop
# HuggingFace API Key (Optional) huggingface.api.key=hf_YOUR_API_KEY_HERE ```
### Frontend Configuration (.env)
```env REACT_APP_API_URL=http://localhost:8080/api REACT_APP_API_TIMEOUT=30000 PORT=3000 ```
## API Endpoints
### Astrology Reading API
**POST** `/api/astrology/reading` - Generate a new astrology reading - Request Body: ```json { "userName": "John Doe", "zodiacSign": "Aries", "birthDate": "1990-04-15", "birthTime": "10:30 AM", "birthPlace": "New York, USA", "readingType": "Daily" } ```
**GET** `/api/astrology/reading/{id}` - Get a specific reading by ID
**GET** `/api/astrology/readings/user/{userName}` - Get all readings for a specific user
**GET** `/api/astrology/readings/zodiac/{zodiacSign}` - Get all readings for a zodiac sign
**GET** `/api/astrology/readings` - Get all readings
**DELETE** `/api/astrology/reading/{id}` - Delete a reading
## Using HuggingFace AstroSage-8B Model
### Get Your API Key 1. Visit: https://huggingface.co/settings/tokens 2. Create a new API token (read access is sufficient) 3. Copy the token
### Configure the API Key
**Option 1: Update application.properties** ```properties huggingface.api.key=hf_your_actual_api_key_here ```
**Option 2: Environment Variable** ```bash set HUGGINGFACE_API_KEY=hf_your_actual_api_key_here ```
**Option 3: System Property** ```bash java -Dhuggingface.api.key=hf_your_actual_api_key_here -jar astrology-backend-1.0.0.jar ```
## Frontend Features
1. **Astrology Reading Form** - Input user details (name, birth date, time, place) - Select zodiac sign - Generate personalized readings
2. **Reading Display** - View detailed astrology readings - Display personality traits, love insights, career guidance - Show lucky elements and recommendations
3. **Reading History** - View all previous readings - Filter by zodiac sign - Delete old readings
## Troubleshooting
### Backend won't start - **Error**: Port 8080 already in use - Solution: Change port in application.properties or use `-Dserver.port=9090`
- **Error**: Maven not found - Solution: Add Maven to PATH or use full path to mvn executable
### Frontend won't start - **Error**: npm ERR! Missing script: "start" - Solution: Ensure package.json exists and npm install was run
- **Error**: Cannot find module 'react' - Solution: Run `npm install` in frontend directory
### API Connection Issues - **Error**: CORS errors - Solution: Ensure backend is running on http://localhost:8080
- **Error**: Cannot reach backend - Solution: Check REACT_APP_API_URL in .env file
### HuggingFace API Issues - **Error**: 401 Unauthorized - Solution: Verify API key is correct and has not expired
- **Error**: Model loading timeout - Solution: Model might be loading on first use, wait a few moments
- **If no API key**: App will use mock responses automatically
## Production Deployment
### Backend (Docker) ```dockerfile FROM openjdk:17-slim COPY target/astrology-backend-1.0.0.jar app.jar ENTRYPOINT ["java", "-jar", "app.jar"] ```
### Frontend (Docker) ```dockerfile FROM node:18-alpine as build WORKDIR /app COPY package*.json ./ RUN npm install COPY . . RUN npm run build
FROM nginx:alpine COPY --from=build /app/build /usr/share/nginx/html ```
## Development Tips
1. **Backend Development** - Use IntelliJ IDEA Community Edition for Java development - Enable hot reload: `mvn spring-boot:run -Dspring-boot.run.jvmArguments="-Xmx1024m -XX:TieredStopAtLevel=1"`
2. **Frontend Development** - React DevTools browser extension recommended - Use `npm run build` to create production bundle
3. **Database** - H2 console available at: http://localhost:8080/h2-console - JDBC URL: `jdbc:h2:mem:aiastro` - Username: `sa` - Password: (leave empty)
## Additional Resources
- **Spring Boot Documentation**: https://spring.io/projects/spring-boot - **React Documentation**: https://react.dev - **HuggingFace Documentation**: https://huggingface.co/docs - **H2 Database**: http://www.h2database.com
## Support
For issues or questions: 1. Check the troubleshooting section above 2. Review application logs in console 3. Verify all prerequisites are installed correctly 4. Ensure backend and frontend are running on correct ports
---
**Version**: 1.0.0 **Last Updated**: January 18, 2026

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd"> <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
<parent> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId> <version>3.2.0</version> <relativePath/> </parent>
<groupId>com.aiastro</groupId> <artifactId>astrology-backend</artifactId> <version>1.0.0</version> <name>AI Astrology Backend</name> <description>Spring AI based backend for AI Astrology</description>
<properties> <java.version>17</java.version> </properties>
<dependencies> <!-- Spring Boot Starters --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId> </dependency>
<dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-jpa</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Database --> <dependency> <groupId>com.h2database</groupId> <artifactId>h2</artifactId> <scope>runtime</scope> </dependency>
<!-- Lombok --> <dependency> <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId> <artifactId>lombok</artifactId> <optional>true</optional> </dependency>
<!-- JSON Processing --> <dependency> <groupId>com.fasterxml.jackson.core</groupId> <artifactId>jackson-databind</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Testing --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency>
<!-- HTTP Client for API calls --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-webflux</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- RestTemplate --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework</groupId> <artifactId>spring-web</artifactId> </dependency> </dependencies>
<build> <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId> <configuration> <excludes> <exclude> <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId> <artifactId>lombok</artifactId> </exclude> </excludes> </configuration> </plugin> </plugins> </build>
</project>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd"> <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
<parent> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId> <version>3.2.0</version> <relativePath/> </parent>
<groupId>com.aiastro</groupId> <artifactId>astrology-backend</artifactId> <version>1.0.0</version> <name>AI Astrology Backend</name> <description>Spring AI based backend for AI Astrology</description>
<properties> <java.version>17</java.version> </properties>
<dependencies> <!-- Spring Boot Starters --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId> </dependency>
<dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-jpa</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Database --> <dependency> <groupId>com.h2database</groupId> <artifactId>h2</artifactId> <scope>runtime</scope> </dependency>
<!-- Lombok --> <dependency> <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId> <artifactId>lombok</artifactId> <optional>true</optional> </dependency>
<!-- JSON Processing --> <dependency> <groupId>com.fasterxml.jackson.core</groupId> <artifactId>jackson-databind</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Testing --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency>
<!-- HTTP Client for API calls --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-webflux</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- RestTemplate --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework</groupId> <artifactId>spring-web</artifactId> </dependency> </dependencies>
<build> <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId> <configuration> <excludes> <exclude> <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId> <artifactId>lombok</artifactId> </exclude> </excludes> </configuration> </plugin> </plugins> </build>
</project>
